titles.title: Fort Eisenhower National Guard Support Act
Fort Eisenhower National Guard Support Act
A bill to authorize the appropriation of amounts for the construction of a National Guard and Reserve Center at Fort Eisenhower, Georgia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Fort Eisenhower National Guard Support Act
This bill authorizes FY2025 appropriations for the Department of Defense to construct a National Guard and Reserve Center at Fort Eisenhower, Georgia.
